mas.to.description: Hello! mas.to is a fast, up-to-date and fun Mastodon server.

shakedown.social.description: A community for live music fans with roots in the jam scene. Shakedown Social is run by a team of volunteers (led by @clifff and @sethadam1) and funded by donations.

paquita.masto.host.description: Esta es una instancia feminista, antifascista, antirracista y LGTBIQ-friendly que lucha activamente contra el acoso a sus usuarios y usuarias en todas sus formas, explícitas e implícitas.

astrodon.social.description: A Mastodon community server for anyone interested in astronomy, astrophysics, astrophotography, and adjacent sciences.

nojack.easydns.ca.description: Clean, civil, clueful Mastodon instance for easyDNS members, techies and weirdos. SPAM BOTS WILL BE SUSPENDED

muenster.im.description: Aus Münster für Münster und für alle anderen netten Menschen.

yiff.life.description: Yiff.Life is oriented towards those in the furry and LGBTQA+ communities.

registration.message: YL is 18+ only. Registration is invite-only. You must know an existing member to get an invite to this instance.

hci.social.description:
A social platform for Human-computer Interaction researchers and practitioners.
Hosted by Princeton HCI. Managed by a group of volunteers.

vkl.world.description:
Першы беларускамоўны сервер у сеціве Mastodon. Размовы з тымі, хто разумее 😏

freeradical.zone.description: Infosec and privacy and technology and leftward politics and cats and dogs and...

registration.message: Send a message to @tek@freeradical.zone if you'd like to register an account on this instance.

todon.nl.description: Radicaal linkse anti-autoritaire server. Voor anarchisten, socialisten, (klimaat)activisten, LHBTQIA+, antiracisten, antifascisten, antikapitalisten, intersectionelen, veganisten, mensenrechten, enz.

planet.moe.description: 서브컬쳐 향유자들을 위한 한국어 마스토돈 인스턴스, 플래닛이에요.

social.politicaconciencia.org.description: Foro que privilegia el diálogo informado y respetuoso; un entorno apropiado para expresarte sin ser censurado por tu ideología o tus creencias. Temáticas: Política, Ciencia y Cultura. 750 caracteres.

epicure.social.description: A Mastodon community with a food and wine focus. Mainly English speaking, open to all epicurians.

disabled.social.description: A place for people who are chronically ill, mentally ill, disabled, and friends/families/allies to come together, meet, share knowledge and random banter, and just about anything else.

tooot.im.description:
Tooot.im, a Mastodon instance (He | En mostly)
רשת מסטודון עברית | חופשית משיקולים תאגידיים | פדרטיבית עם הFediverse

registration.message:
סטטוס הרשמה

ההרשמה בהזמנה

ההרשמה למופע בהזמנה בלבד. לקבלת הזמנה ניתן לפנות לכל משתמש.ת רשום.ה

שרתים אחרים בעברית

לשרתים עבריים אחרים בפדרציה שאנחנו מכירים לחצו על הכותרת הבאה:

רשימת השרתים (נפתחת בלחיצה)
  • היוש
  • הד.ים
  • פרסמתי.קום
  • לפטודון.סושיאל

  • קשקוש.נט

  • רשת.סושיאל

לרשימה של שרתי מסטודון ראו כאן. ניתן לסנן את הרשימה לשרתים שהכריזו שאחת השפות הראשיות שלהן היא עברית

חיפוש שרתים

מנועי חיפוש, רשימות ומפות נוספים
  • &#128269fediverse.observer
  • &#128269To the Fediverse
  • &#128269Fediverse Party
  • &#128269Mastodon Near Me

English

Our registration status is now closed due to rapid growth in local population. You can instead register via invitation, open an account on a different instance, or open one of your own! Have a Look at the list above for recommended instance search engines/maps

registration.message:
Registration has been disabled for the time being.

This is a temporary measure while the fediverse in general rides out the current wave of new people flooding in from a failing commercial network.



Invitations to join can still be sent by members.

Please check out https://instances.social for others that might have a few slots open.

mastodon.la.description:
Mastodon.la es una instancia generalista y ligeramente moderada. Bienvenidos todos los temas con buena onda, respeto y sin desnudos innecesarios :). Castellano/Español y otros lenguages bienvenidos.
/
Mastodon.la is a generalist instance lightly moderated. All opinions are welcome. Be cool, respectful and leave your clothes on if possible :) 
Spanish preferred but all languages are welcome.

registration.message: Registration is available at https://signup.noagendasocial.com

masthead.social.description: All the news that's fit to toot.

o3o.ca.description:
欢迎来到o3o(嘟站)！这是一个泛话题社区，无论你的兴趣是什么，你都可以自由地通过发布“嘟嘟”来吐槽一切、摸鱼扯皮。
本社区由位于加拿大的 O3O.Foundation 项目运营。我们相信由社会组织运营基本通讯软件和设施是必要的，它们不应被控制在大型企业和政府手中。

mastodon.ml.description: Русскоязычный сервер социальной сети Mastodon. Зона общения, свободная от рекламы и шпионажа, теперь и в России.

tech.lgbt.description: This Mastodon instance is for tech workers, academics, students, furries, and others interested in tech who are LGBTQIA+ or Allies. All are welcome to join us!

mastodon.iriseden.eu.description: Instance Mastodon hébergée en France chez OVH (AS16276) et maintenue par @iriseden. Vos données ne seront jamais partagées à qui que ce soit et sont sauvegardées tous les jours. Les inscriptions sont ouvertes, les sujets sont libres tant que vous respectez les quelques conditions. Vous pouvez aussi vous inscrire sur mon instance Peertube ou une autre :)

eldritch.cafe.description: Une instance se voulant accueillante pour les personnes queers, féministes et anarchistes ainsi que pour leurs sympathisant·e·s. Nous sommes principalement francophone.

registration.message:
[fr] Les inscriptions sont fermées pour une durée indéterminée pour permettre à l'équipe d'administration de gérer Eldritch Café dans de bonnes conditions. En attendant, si quelqu'un de l'instance vous l'a recommandé vous pouvez lui demander une créer une invitation pour nous rejoindre sur https://eldritch.cafe/invites

[en] Registrations are closed for an indefinite period to allow the administration team to manage Eldritch Café in good conditions. In the meantime, if someone from the instance has recommended it to you, you can ask them to create an invitation to join us at https://eldritch.cafe/invites

hachyderm.io.description:
Here we are trying to build a curated network of respectful professionals in the tech industry around the globe. Welcome anyone who follows the rules and needs a safe home or fresh start.

We are hackers, professionals, enthusiasts, and are passionate about life, respect, and digital freedom. We believe in peace and balance.

Safe space. Tech Industry. Economics. OSINT. News. Rust. Linux. Aurae. Kubernetes. Go. C. Infrastructure. Security. LGTBQIA+. Pets. Hobbies.

registration.message:
Journa.host is a Mastodon server for journalists. Membership is limited to working journalists, retired journalists, academics, and others who are clearly journalism-related.

If that doesn’t describe you, there are lots of other sites to choose from at https://joinmastodon.org/servers

If you're a journalist interested in joining the journa.host Mastodon, please review our community guidelines and submit your application for review by our team of moderators.

registration.message:
As a result of recent mass registrations, due to a mass migration from twitter users, we are beginning to reach the performance limits of the server. We need to proceed to a planned upgrade to be able to handle the added load.



Registrations are temporarily closed, with estimation of reopening after january once we have upgraded our server infrastructure. Until then you can try to join one of the many other instances across the fediverse, there are plenty of other furry servers still able to take in new users.


You can choose another furry instance by visiting FurryFediverse to find some recommendations.


Thank you for your understanding, see you around on fedi!

registration.message:
Joining Wandering.Shop

We are presently allowing Wandering Shop members to invite friends/contacts to join the server with a limited invite code each week. Please contact a current member to get the latest code if one remains open. We will issue new invites approximately weekly until we have a bit of stability achived after the current exodus from other social spaces.
